title: Spotlights: Rachel Perkins
brief_description: An Australian film and television director, producer, and screenwriter. She is known for her films Radiance (1998), One Night the Moon (2001), Bran Nue Dae (2009) and Jasper Jones (2017). Rachel discusses the merits of film and television from an Indigenous perspective, particularly in relation to audience.

constellations_primary.name: Rachel Perkins
constellations_primary.description: The moving image has helped tell First Peoples stories through documentary, films and TV shows, with acclaimed director, producer and screenwriter Rachel Perkins contributing significantly to these stories.

description: Rachel Perkins is an Australian film and TV director, producer and screenwriter. She’s known for her films Radiance (1998), One Night the Moon (2001), Bran Nue Dae (2009) and Jasper Jones (2017), and is co-director of landmark TV series First Australians. Rachel discusses the merits of film and TV from an Indigenous perspective, particularly in relation to the audience.
